{{dcl|num=1|since=fs_ts|1=
bool is_directory( file_status s );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=fs_ts|1=
bool is_directory( const path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=fs_ts|1=

Checks if the given file status or path corresponds to a directory.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|s.type() {{==}} file_type::directory}}.

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|is_directory(status(p))}}.

@3@ Equivalent to {{c|is_directory(status(p, ec))}}. Returns {{c|false}} if error occurs.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|s|file status to check}}
{{par|p|path to query}}
{{par|ec|error code to modify in case of errors}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the given path or file status corresponds to a directory, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Exceptions===
@1,3@ {{unreviewed noexcept}}

@2@ Throws {{c|filesystem_error}} if an error occurs. The exception object is constructed with {{c|p}} as an argument.
